MAIN_MESSAGE: The following information is for customers in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8PM due to repairs required on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and safely as possible by 2am. We will update messages with any additional information as quickly as we can. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:40PM on 04 February 2021.
